subject: Bribery and Kickbacks
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in Munich charged a former executive of the German bank BayernLB with taking bribes from Bernard Ecclestone, the chief executive of Formula One, in connection with the 2006 sale of the bank’s stake in Formula One.
snippet: Prosecutors in Munich charged a former executive of the German bank BayernLB with taking bribes from Bernard Ecclestone, the chief executive of Formula One, in connection with the 2006 sale of the bank’s stake in Formula One.
